sentences.sentence: There had been no indication of either breathlessness or any loss of mental faculties right until his death.
sentences.translation: 直到去世，他既没有出现呼吸困难也没有脑功能丧失的迹象。

sentences.sentence: By the age of 40, some people are already experiencing breathlessness.
sentences.translation: 到40岁时，有些人已经感到气绝。

sentences.sentence: Heartburn and breathlessness are pregnancy symptoms usually mentioned in passing as an afterthought.
sentences.translation: 事后想来，胃部灼热和呼吸困难是怀孕过程中经常被提到的症状。
